body: A druid can spontaneously cast summon nature's ally in place of a prepared spell of the same level or higher. The divine energy of the spell that the summon spell substitutes for is converted as if that spell had been prepared all along.
name: Spontaneous Casting of Summon Nature's Ally Spells
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Divine Spells/Preparing Divine Spells/Spontaneous Casting of Summon Natures Ally Spells
